ISSUE.TITLE: Exception after migrating from 4.50 to 4.60 with MySQL database
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Install fresh 4.50 and try to update to 4.60 ![nop-migrate-to-460_mysql](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/37818094/db47b11b-871c-47dc-a493-75dff464d533) How to fix: 1. Apply MySqlDateTimeWithPrecisionMigration migration after DataMigration

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6794 Fix incorrect results in the sales summary report when applying some filters
